name: 2024 8th International Conference on New Energy and Applications
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers of ICNEA will be included the ACESD conference proceedings as a workshop, and submitted for indexing by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. A few selected papers will be recommended to International Journal of Smart Grid and Clean Energy for publication after being extended, which will be indexed by Inspec, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
